title: A Pair of T206 Wiltse's For Sale, One Factory 42 Piedmont $30 for Both
author: tinkertoeverstochance

posts.post_title: A Pair of T206 Wiltse's For Sale, One Factory 42 Piedmont $30 for Both

posts.post_content: Please educate me: how can you tell that's a factory 42?  (I'm sorry for the dumb question, I'm new to this :o)

Chris
You can see the "n.c."(North Carolina) at the bottom, on the back of the card which is where factory 42 was located.

Hi Chris,

Do you see the N.C. on the back bottom of the Wiltse Portrait? The only piedmont to come with the state designation N.C. was piedmont factory 42, so that is how we know this a factory 42.
Thanks guys!  I promise that's my last stupid question (for at least 15 minutes anyway :)).
that is one of the darkest 42s I have ever seen.I will post a scan of my 42 Wiltse later
